title: Seeds Garden Bistro
typeOfFood: Pizza, Chinese, Western, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Singaporean
description: 籽田, opened Jan 2016, is a plant-based bistro inspired by the principles of naturopathy. It presents plant-herb (from East and West) based cuisine. The herbs are selected by an in-house medical herbalist. Items on the menu include a mix of dishes such as pizza, pasta, porridge, rice set, herbal drinks, desserts. No mock meat or MSG.
